articles.description: Expected to be launched this spring, the Surface Go 2 is thought to be a minor upgrade over the existing model. While the Surface Go 2 will feature the same chassis as its predecessor, it will also have a larger display. Accordingly, the Surface Go 2 will get…

articles.title: Vertere Acoustics DG-1 turntable gets Magneto cartridge upgrade - What Hi-Fi?
articles.description: The brand's most affordable deck now ships with a new cartridge
articles.content:
Vertere Acoustics has upgraded its entry-level DG-1 Dynamic Groove turntable with a new cartridge, the Magneto. Also made by Vertere, it now ships as standard on all DG-1s and has done for the last month.
The Magneto is closely aligned to the Audio Technica … [+1059 chars]
